archimate:Goal.name: Secured access solution for exposing services to consumers
archimate:Goal.documentation: Enables to publish Foundation Platform Services to end users through a secured system offering functions like Web Access Firewall (WAF), Intrusion Prevention System (IDP), Federation, Single-Sign-On (SSO), Multi Factor Authentication (MFA) and obviously also internet connection. These are used for example by ServiceNow to publish portal to internet or PAM system to allow inbound connections for operators.
